article.title: Flagg Appointed to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Under Secretary of Defense (Acquisition

article.text: Melissa L. Flagg has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the deputy assistant secretary of defense for research, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
